website_summaries.verdict: This indoor grill’s best feature isn’t its ability to perfectly grill burgers to taste like a traditional grill, but its innovative window for checking on your food without opening the hood and allowing heat to escape, which dramatically shortens overall cooking times.
pros: Tastes just like an outdoor grill
cons: Its low power consumption is great for your energy bill, but may take longer to reach your preferred grilling temperature

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this based on good reviews. However, it does not get as hot as expected. I grilled already cooked chicken kabobs from costco on here and it took forever. I will not attempt to cook any raw meat on here. We probably will just get rid of it at this point. I recommend putting up the money for a better indoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rubino

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't Sear
customer_reviews.text: Well...it does everything it says it does but cook. The grill doesn't get very hot or SEAR as advertised. I preheated it for 30 minutes (instructions say it only needs 10 mins to pre-heat) and it wouldn't even sear fish and shrimp. It's a shame because I love everything else about it. Size is great for the kitchen, mostly dishwasher safe and the grill is heavy duty and quality non-stick. BUT...not enough heat!
customer_reviews.author: T. McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough for a good steak sear.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this grill because sometimes I'm just too lazy to light the BBQ for my steaks. I was replacing an electric grill that I had for several years and was looking for one that could get as hot as possible so was excited about the sear option and was easier to clean. Even after letting grill heat for 10 to 15 minutes at sear temp it just doesn't do the job. Might be good for burgers, hot dogs and thin chicken slices but not steak. I'll go back to my old grill, if I can still find one, that was half the cost and got much hotter than the Hamilton Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Lady

customer_reviews.title: blew up the first time it was plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use it first time a few days ago, a very strong burning smell, a flare, and then nothing. Of course that was a week past the 30 day return policy, so I am stuck with an inoperable item. Tried to deal with Hamilton Beach through their warranty, aside from being rude and hanging up on me, they advised me the only option is to get a replacement, but I have to pay for the shipping costs. For receiving a faulty product! I am more than upset and will never trust a Hamilton Beach product. As a quick update, Amazon stood behind this product and provided a refund. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Only works for very thin foods
customer_reviews.text: The only part that gets hot is the gate itself. On a normal grill or grill pan, the heat comes from BOTH the gate and in the gaps from the heat source below. Thus, this is like using a branding iron to cook a steak or chop. Great grill marks, but everything else cooks very very very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Mondoman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Heat. Don't Bother With This Grill.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars, I would. The silly thing didn't heat! I seem to remember reading other reviews stating the same problem. For as many good reviews as this got, I would expect a decent item. Sadly, it wasn't. We waited and waited for it to achieve the correct grilling temperature. Lights came on, went off and came on again, so I know the power was working. We put boneless, skinless chicken breasts on to grill and after half an hour, they weren't even close to being done. Returned the grill to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gbobmi

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for Damaged Parts
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 grills. One was an original purchase and the second was a replacement. Both of them showed a lot of manufacturing related defects (shoddy workmanship). There are two main things I noticed. The first is that the plastic bar ,where the collection pan fits, is damaged. You can run your finger and experience a deep dip and the roughness of burnt plastic. See Pic 1. The second is that the various parts, particularly around the collection bin, having scratches or the parts not being a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shery

customer_reviews.title: Good but wont last you long3
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, works exactly as you would expect, and allows me to cook meats in a healthy fashion. HOWEVER there is a flaw in the design, in which the grease that drips through the grill, and somehow traveled into the connections that allows the grill to become hot. Those contacts/connectors can be cleaned and put back into place for a temporary fix. I had to remove five screws total to access the area and clean it again. ALSO my grill plate has had the Teflon peel off from cleaning and normal use, dont expect it to last. That being said I still use it, just be aware of maintaining it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian W

customer_reviews.title: great design
customer_reviews.text: I saw an informercial on an indoor "smokeless" grill and looked for it on amazon. Expensive, and saw this one for much less with good reviews. After using it several times, this has to be better than the other one. Threw some frozen burgers on it tonight, done in 10-15 min, perfect. Almost like going outside on the grill. I put the grease tray in the dishwasher, pulled out the nonstick grill and put it in the dishwasher, done. No smoke, caught all the grease below, easy cleanup. Best of all fantastic beef and bean burgers. will grab another for xmas present for my son.
customer_reviews.author: G. Omer

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Foreman grill, which I'd had problems with. The bottom grill cooked too hot, and burned up the ceramic coating, in less than four months. They sent me a free replacement, and it started to do the same thing. This unit cooks a little differently, with just one heating element. It's good size, which makes cleaning a little difficult, though it comes apart well, for that purpose. I've found the cooking times a little off, and have adjusted accordingly. Most items need to cook a little longer than they recommend. Overall, it's a good unit, just not 5 stars worth.
customer_reviews.author: Acur81

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean!
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to clean at all. It gets really dirty with just one use and Hass sorts of knooks and crannies where debri gets stuck. And the griddle part has Teflon on one side only. I really did not like this feature at all, it made it impossible to clean once it was baked on. Once I got it back clean I knew it was going back for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: melissa jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Only gave it 4 stars because it does give off some decent smoke sometimes. I use it next to the fan above the oven and that helps a lot. Cooks just like an outdoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Q

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Grill Substitute
customer_reviews.text: The best indoor grill I have ever used. Extremely easy to clean (dishwasher) and works just as well as a normal gas grill. Heats up to over 350° in less than 10minutes and also includes a searing option.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Grill lines impart flavor & beauty
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised how much love this grill! We have had it only 24 hours. We grilled thick cut smoked pork belly, really put flavor into it and the grill lines were flavorful and attractive. Then we flour seasoned some cubed beef steak. I wanted to see how it worked with something dryer, not so greasy. There was a nice crust cooking it on sear. Again, the grill lines this leaves on your meat impart flavor and beauty to your dish.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Love this indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest to clean, best product I've bought for my kitchen. Being the only cook, and he doesn't like grilling very often, I wanted an indoor grill that I could use for anything. So far I've only used it to cook meat, but it warms quickly, cooks as recommended through the guide, abd did I mention it's easy to clean? Best birthday present to myself I've done in a while. You'll thank yourself for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: A superb Electric indoor or outdoor Grill.
customer_reviews.text: We are now in a senior retirement apartment and miss our Weber grill. We purchased this Hamilton Beach Indoor Grill but were afraid to use it in our small kitchen as the smoke alarm is nearby. We used it on our balcony and were so pleased that it did not smoke at all. Cooked Lamb chops and they came out perfect. Will now use it in the kitchen during the winter. We read all the reviews and it is so easy to use. Comes apart for easy cleaning. We recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy in N. Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. It is easy to handle, the grease tray and heating plate are easily removed and dishwasher cleanable. The lid is less easy to remove and doesn't fit in my full sized dishwasher. But the real bummer is that it just doesn't get hot enough. After 30 minutes cooking on the highest temperature setting my hamburgers were still raw in the middle. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L Thor

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday to me!!
customer_reviews.text: Next Wednesday I’m turning 62! I bought myself a present, something I’ve been wanting for two years. I live downtown in a beautiful high-rise which I love, but I can’t grill on my balcony, and the gas grills downstairs close to the pool are big and intimidating. I got this indoor smokeless grill! It is as different from a George Forman as night is from day! My food was cooked beautifully and was juicy, full of flavor with no mess. 🤩😍 I’m thrilled and just had the most gorgeous, delicious, and healthy meal.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i must have a defective grill....i followed the instructions when cooking meat. i tried with a pork chop that was less than 1/2 inch thick...instructions say "sear for 4 minutes" then reduce to 350F, and approximate cook time is 7-9 minutes. it took me nearly 45 minutes to cook the pork. At 9 minutes the meat was still raw. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Mendez

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: This grill takes forever to heat up and a long time to cook food to the correct temperature. It is hard to clean between the spaces but on the plus side it is non stick. New: Update since I have been using the grill for some time now just because I don’t want to spend money on a new one quite yet, I can still say I don’t care for this grill. It loses its correct temperature and has to reheat which delays cooking time and dries out the food. Do yourself a favor and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: N.fares

customer_reviews.title: Best grill EVER!!!!! TOSS OUT PROPANE
customer_reviews.text: Omg I agree with all reviews on this grill. The cord is way to short. Only fault is that! I secretly bought and use breakfast bacon, steaks, veggies never tasted better! Grilled cheese, kabobs, now my hubby loves too! We wont buy a big messy propane grill again! Saved us a $1k on a stinky grill that I hated to clean. If they made this bigger I would buy too! So easy to clean. I even leave some of prior grease on it for next meal instead of spraying. Love the easy to clean fits in my didhwasher. Love drip pan. Thank you!!!! This is why we read Amazon reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Exact dimentions.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use it yet.But I had wanted to give exact dimensions of product. Overall 16 1/2" long. 12 " wide including bar. Grill space 12 1/4" long - 9" wide. (I was hoping the grill space was a little longer). I read that it was 15" long and thought it was the grill area. The cord is 26" long to prong. Nice looking, easy to take apart and wash and reassemble. I'll update after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Szookie

customer_reviews.title: Not a replacement for the outdoor, but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what the negative reviews are all about that aren’t mechanical faults. This thing is great! Used it for steaks, shrimp, and vegetables without any issues...or smoke! Even used a marinade! Meat cooks to perfectly desired temperature without drying out or even coming close to. Sure, not the same taste as coming off of an outdoor grill, but is satisfying. Great alternative for a quick grill Meal. Easy cleanup too!
customer_reviews.author: Escaping_reality

customer_reviews.title: Neat little grill
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at purchasing because I wanted something that could give my food those nice grill marks. Well, this grill met my expectations. I have been grilling chicken breasts and asparagus on it and not wasting a whole lot of time. Also, because there is not and actual flame, I don't have to stand over it for fear of burning the food. The control with the ability to change temperature is a nice feature as well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Insight_full

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: My sister had this grill and used when we were at her house. I couldn't get over how easy to use. We live in condos and can't have outdoor grills. This is perfect. As soon as we got it, I made steaks on it. Just as good as outdoor barbecue. Brats are perfect. Can't wait to try other things. I hate cleaning grills but this is amazing. Just take it apart and put it in dishwasher. Whoever designed this deserves a medal.
customer_reviews.author: jmk

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have bought in awhile.....so worth the cost too. I tried it last night and made steaks. They were PERFECT, and clean up was the best. I attached pictures below. I did not include the rack in my after clean up picture because it needed to cool down. It was also a snap to clean. I never write reviews but this product was well deserving of one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get better than this!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how easy it is to grill and clean. Everything came out perfect with beautiful grill mark and tasted great. The clean up was easy peasy, everything came right off. I also like the look and the fact that it’s big enough to prep two meals. There’s absolutely no reason not to by this grill and considering the price you really can’t go wrong. Just a heads up there is no off button once it’s plugged in it’s going so keep that in mind !
customer_reviews.author: Malisa Elizehi

customer_reviews.title: Great  appliance
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill a year and a half ago and it has been one of my best purchases. I had been occasionally using an outdoor gas grill but it was inconvenient. I live alone and this electric grill seemed a good choice. it is easy to use, easy to clean and works great. The manual suggests cook times and I use that as a guide along with an instant thermometer so now, unlike when I used the outdoor grill, i never overcook things.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sear marks, great for grilling whitefish indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time tonight, grilling tilapia for fish tacos. I seared the first side for 3 min, turned them over, 3 min at 375. Worked like a charm! Appears to cook evenly. Beautifully charred and cooked perfectly. I did this on the counter of my apartment. I had the vent fan going, an oscillating fan and the windows open. Smoke was minimal and my alarms didnt go off! My only suggestion to improve would be digital temp settings and timer.
customer_reviews.author: FLbleubelle

customer_reviews.title: Cooks beautifully & super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is our top purchase from Amazon this year. Anyone wanting an indoor grill, this is the one to get. I have used it four times to grill pork chops, steak, salmon and hotdogs. Every item cooked beautifully. This grill lives up to it’s claim that it’s easy to clean. Three times we just cleaned the cooking area with soap and water and once easily took it apart and put it in the dishwasher. We couldn’t be happier with this grill and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sure beats grilling out in the summer heat!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I didn't even use the outside grill last year! This smokeless beauty is so easy to use that I'll probably use it daily. It will take a bit of trial and error to figure out appropriate temps and the duration of grilling itself...but that's a small price to pay for such convenience. The machine is is great looking and well designed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dale C Ludi

customer_reviews.title: This is a good grill. It works very well inside
customer_reviews.text: This is a good grill. It works very well inside, and the food we have cooked turns out very nicely. My only issue is that it seems to take twice as long for food to cook all the way through than on a regular grill/pan. The grill will heat up, and once it reaches optimum temperature, does not remain there. it continuously reheats itself. This means that it takes longer for food to cook. Overall, a very nice piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked great 4 times. The fifth time it wouldn't power up. I found the problem. The electrical connector that connects the base to the heating element became intermittent. If I jiggled the grill, the ready light would come on but wouldn't stay on. Glad I bought it from Amazon because of their superior customer service and free return shipping. I'm not to get a replacement. I opted for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Glenn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill, but No Back
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if it included a scrubbing brush, but you can find one pretty cheap at the grocery store. Steak tastes pretty good (for an indoor grill). One big complaint is that there is no back - several times I have, accidentally, pushed meat out the back and off the grill. Luckily the grill is on a countertop, but it's still a pain in the butt to reposition the grill so I can reach the burning hot Patty (and then clean the countertop). You could always add all makeshift back to it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher M Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent indoor grill very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best thing I’ve ever ordered on Amazon. It’s an excellent grill, hasn’t smoked at all. I’ve grilled hamburgers, hotdogs, and shrimp so far with stellar results. Tomorrow I grilling ribeye steaks. I’ve virtually stopped using my oven except to bake. I hand wash l the parts bcs it’s easy to do & hopefully will extend its usefulness. I would definitely buy it again without hesitation and will when this one wears out from use.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Werner

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s designed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to purchase this grill but between the combination of mostly positive reviews and a gut feeling, I ordered it. Arrived neatly packaged and easy to assemble. Set it up, washed it according to the directions and let it run for about 20 minutes to get the juices flowing and burn off any factory dust, chemicals Etc. One it reached the desired temp I added a few sprays of non stick spray just in case and grilled some marinated chicken. I was pleasantly surprised by the lack of smoke (literally smokeless) and how tender and juicy the end result was. Easy to take apart and clean as well. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: So i had this grill and it was great. I used it every once and a while for two months. Whil I was in the middle of cooking a. Urger, the grill just died. It stopped cooking my food, the lights stayed on as if it was working but it did not cook the food. I followed the instructions and have cooked a few burgers on it before. Of course I cannot return it and product support is done by some shady phone service company where no one speaks fluent English.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor grill ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grill so many times since purchasing! Ive had a George Foreman grill for years and really wanted something that was more like an actual grill. This one delivers! Ive made chicken and steak kabobs, grilled all kinds of meats, and much more. The grill plate comes off easily for cleaning. Whole thing breaks down into 4 easy to store and assemble parts.
customer_reviews.author: krissylass

customer_reviews.title: Lack of removable nonstick plate
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use the product as an indoor grill. The product posted on Amazon clearly stated that a removable nonstick plate would be included with the grill.. It even shows a picture of the plate on the box but the plate was not included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Kind

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill! Best grill I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have never grilled steaks so beautifully charred with perfect pink in between over the various levels of doneness. When I ordered this, the first one was defective though because it was taking an increasingly long time to reach searing level temperature (up to 30 minutes!). The replacement worked as it should, and it reaches searing level consistently in about six minutes. I just hope it lasts, that's why I didn't rate the durability because that still remains to be seen. But so far, I love it! I will update this in the future on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Clean
customer_reviews.text: Very good electric grill! I bought to use it in my apartment that doesn’t allow gas or charcoal grill. I’ve made burgers, steaks and garlic bread and the taste is very similar to a charcoal grill. Of course, it is not the same result but it’s very similar. I had no problem with the smoke doing burgers, but my steaks had a lot of fat so it caused a little of smoke (which didn’t surprise me, it’s normal). Overall, i would recommend this grill for indoor use!! Tip: put it under the fan in your stove so if there’s smoke the fan will help.
customer_reviews.author: Patt

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Price, Performance, Cannot be Beat
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake thinking this was a Foreman type grill. I almost returned it when I found it to be an actual indoor grill where the juices etc. Drop through to a tray underneath. I cannot imagine not having this in my kitchen now. It is phenomenal. It takes as long as an outdoor grill except for heating up time if you use coals outdoors. No smoking and I have cooked wings and meat on it. Large cooking area as well. So easy to clean it is a crime! Love this grill. The quality and price of Hamilton Beach appliances, in my experience, cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the brands you know. This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Simply, the best indoor grill I’ve had ever! Just a few months ago I bought the Power Smokeless grill after seeing the infomercial. It was a nightmare to clean and it broke after using it for 5 months. The temperature was not hot enough either, and it’s double the price. I gave this one a try and so far I’m happy with it. It sears the meats better, and the cleaning part is a breeze. I highly recommend this grill!
customer_reviews.author: UniC

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase you will ever do in your life
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before jumping the gun on this. Originally I wanted one of those smokeless bbq grill, but then I stumbled on to this too. Plus it was way cheaper. Purchased and cooked my very first steak, in 34, yes it took me that long. I had no idea on how to cook steak. But with the right cut I’m sure it would be fine. This grill cooked my steak to perfection 3 min on each side. And I grilled some vegetables on it too. I was blown away. My steak turned out to be way better than any steak I’ve eaten at a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for the George Foreman Grill that died
customer_reviews.text: Overall Great. A little hard at the high end to control temp. Cleaning is both good and bad. I love the tray underneath the grill and catches everything, and I mean everything, not a drop on the counter. BUT cleaning the tray and the grill is awkward in the sink, they say you can put in Dishwasher, but they want it a gentle cycle and you still need to pre-rinse. Overall still Awesome Kitchen Grill.
customer_reviews.author: DeathPilot3

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It fits perfectly on my countertop between my fridge & stove, so I can use the stove light & fan when cooking. The window top makes it unnecessary to open the top during cooking. I love the sear component & closed ridged cooking area. I've cooked meat, chicken, fish, & shellfish on this- everything came out wonderfully, even kabobs & sliced vegetables. Cleanup is a breeze. The only con is that the nonstick surface is chipping a little. I have raved about this bbq to everyone with whom I speak.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought as a housewarming gift for my grandson He tried to use it twice but it would not heat up. I originally bought this because of the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Margaret.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for thin or thick steaks!
customer_reviews.text: Grilled steaks separately — one thick filet and one thin NY strip — both on highest heat. Love the grill marks and ability to close the lid to assist in heating meat throughout. This machine is a breeze to clean. Great invention for indoor grilling. Thin or
customer_reviews.author: j. e. greyer

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice. I have a galley kitchen and it fits nicely in one of my roll out drawers! I cooked 4 good size chicken breast and some zucchini and squash at the same time! I had to split my veggies up and some of the pieces fell through to the bottom tray. No smoke! Super handy and everything is pretty much dishwasher safe! Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: grill
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would of know about lil grill sooner. WOW!! It is so awesome. I mean it is just like grilling outside, minus the insects. The clean up is super simple. Really it is. Just amazing, for the price. Yeppers, I will definitely yell my friends and family. This lil grill, I would buy again and again. Hopefully I don't , in the near future, and it just keeps on going on.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Marie Beeks

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor grill for $
customer_reviews.text: Good sear, temp is consistent, easy to clean. Make sure you have a longer cooking time for bone in meats. I did 3 batches of wing dings in an oil marinade that produced more smoke. Cooking time about 30/40 mins per batch & ckn tenders w/spray oil on grill (no oil marinade, lil smoke) Cooking time about 15/20 mins per batch. U do need oil, spray oil is ok, but it does produce smoke so make sure its well ventilated. If you like to grill & cant grill outdoors I recommend this product. Seafood & veggies should have a lower cook time. FYI make sure you preheat your grill before cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: With this grill, I was able to cook a rare rib eye to my hubbies satisfaction.....something that I have never been able to do correctly with other methods (including outdoor barbecue, hot oven, grill on stove,etc.). He was happy...I was more than happy! Clean up was easy. Storage is a little difficult because of its size, but I may leave it out to use often. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: marshnello

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to grill indoors and absolutely love the "sear" it gives on steaks, burgers, hot dogs, etc. I do not follow the recommended cooking procedures that are included in the product. I preheat on "sear," and then continue to cook on that setting. I reduce the time and meats, poultry, and fish come out perfect. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny mess
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought it would be but works well enough for an electric grill. Used it for the first time to grill a flank steak. Was trying to get it charred, but grill doesn't allow for that as opposed to *grilling" via broil setting in the oven. The plastic sides to the lid have started to be molted and burned due to the heat. And it was a lot harder to clean than I thought it would be. I thought I'd only need to clean the grill and slider on the bottom but the stench of cooked food was terrible the next day and I had to wash the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered this
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional griller. The large grill outside was too much for me yet I was jealous of others who grilled. I bought this product and have used it like 4 times in one week. It does cause a little smoke in the house but not bad. The lid says "hot" and they mean it. Great product, easy to clean, arrived fast and in perfect condition. Highly recommend it to you. The lid comes off and is dishwasher safe as well as the grill portion and the drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and broiling inside really smells the place up even tho its a good smell. I put this on the balcony on a tray table and its perfect. Everything I've made on it has come out delicious. Good temperature control. I like that I can peek inside without opening the door. It's not that difficult to clean, vs cooking inside and cleaning up with a cooking smell that lingers. Not sure if it would be worthwhile for more than 2 people to cook on. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Just get a grill pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this per my wife's request and it seemed like a great idea at first. We used it a lot in the beginning but quickly realized it doesn't offer much benefit over a grill pan. It's big and bulky and the grill part is hard to clean. Sure, it has a non stick surface but that doesn't work well between the ribs and on the under side so those are still a big chore to clean. Also, ours never gets hot enough to actually grill - it just cooks the food without grill lines and gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: chupacabra314

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. My first review was just after i bought it. Amazon asked me to give one. They asked too early. All sites do that. I bought it to use it in the winter rather than my outdoor grill. It doesn't have the char flavor you get with an outdoor grill but I don't mind. It's priced right too. That was part of my decision. Light, easy to assemble, great grilling plate, easy to clean. Now since I have had it for a while the green light doesn't come on anymore. The searing attribute is about a 3 star. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoidable waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give a zero, Amazon won’t let me. I bought this item back in February and today is the third time I used it. It doesn’t heat/cook the food anymore, it is broken. I was skeptical to buy this type of equipment online but I decided to trust the brand name. My mistake. Now I’m out of $70 bucks 4 months down the line and with $30 bucks worth of raw ungrilled steaks which I’m gonna have to throw away. Don’t trust the brand, you can’t trust anything these days.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V. Otero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for sometime for something to replace my George Foreman. I wanted to cut as much fat from my diet as possible. I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. I love this grill. I cooked steaks on it the very first time that I used it. They turned out fantastic, with no smoke. The only thing that I would have done different with them is to marinate them first. I will be using this grill a lot in the future. It was just as advertised and was very easy to clean when I was finished. It was also more affordable than other similar products. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Can't  loose  with this grill.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it cooks indoors with no mess and the food taste as good if not better then cooking on a gas grill outside. Truthfully I haven't used my gas grill since I bought the Hamilton Beach electric indoor grill. I've cooked several different meals on the grill from steaks , poorkchops, fish , hotdogs and hamburgers. Couldn't be happier, strongly recommend buying this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome! only part that is a con for me is the small space you have for the grilling part. Didn’t realize how long it was gonna take to grill up for a family of 7, But I love this. My kids loved it, told me I had to use this every night from now on haha.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Thing makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked a few things with these and it just makes a mess and makes cleaning up not worth the hassle of using it . Idea was to cook grill style in the house while its super cold out , but after multiple uses of this I would rather just use oven or face the cold outside to grill . Which obviously if this isn't an issue for one person , then its a good product and does what you would expect from a cooker .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It's an average product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good grill. I bought it mainly for whole chinese eggplants but it did not grill them well. You have to cut everything thinner for better result. One more thing that I don't like much is all around the grill is plastic including the tray. The edges melted a bit after the first use. I only have it for about 2 months so don't know how long it will last. It's easy to use, warms up quickly and is easy to clean. I handwash.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! This little grill rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This grill makes my life easier, I set it up [outside the door of my kitchen] and grill whatever I want, whenever I want, without the hassle of charcoal or propane. Clean up is easy. I've grilled veggie, fish, all types of meat. I do cook with it outside because, although it may be [somewhat] smokeless at lower temperatures, it is not odorless. If you sear a steak or a hamburger you will get smoke and you will smell it all night long.... so, unless you have a super powerful exhaust fan or air purifier I wouldn't recommend searing indoors. Otherwise, this little grill rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill, use all the time and told everyone I know about it. Only bad thing about grills including this one is there is no on and off switch you have to unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: V Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. I have amazing control over cook process and have grilled perfect steaks, shrimp, chicken, burgers and tuna steak. I do not outdoor grills due to unhealthy char, cleanliness and/or charcoal. Cleanup is amazing with this indoor grill. I can hand clean easy or put in the dishwasher. I use this 3 times a week easily. Sometimes I have to run the exhaust fan is I am searing, I put it on my stove in most cases.
customer_reviews.author: AMO

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i spent two weeks using m son's when i visited last summer. This thing is great, i personally liked it better than the other apartment grill i had. This one the drippings go in a draw under the grill, so you don't see them. The grill, door and the draw are removable, making it easy for cleaning. We use it everyday and are very happy with it. I recommend this product if you live in an apartment and want to grill.
customer_reviews.author: embreux

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, portable, light weight and GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Texas weather is 104 right now,...everyday. Got this gift for my birthday and nothing beats the smell of grilling, inside, Extremely easy to clean, a bit on the personal (small) side, but so quick that you can make food for 3-4 without being left out. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: Great for making steaks, chicken and burgers!. Very little smoke from this as it has a lid. The searing option alone is worth every penny. The drip tray under it catches the grease which is genius. Highly recommend this to anyone. Its night and day between the older George Forman grills. Only down side to this is the cleaning. The grate is dishwasher safe and it cleans it like 95 % but some is still caked on. But it's only minor . Even the lid is washable. You will be super happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill.
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor grill. Cleaning is easy for the most part. Getting grease or fat out between the grill holes is difficult some times so it can be time consuming. This grill maintains temperature and is quick to heat up and sear. The surface is easily scratched so be careful with metal utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an indoor grill, but was unsure of which to choose. After reading the reviews, I picked this particular model. The food cooks evenly and quickly. After, I just throw boiling hot water on the grill (once I take it apart and put it in the sink) and the hot water just cleans away all the dirt. I just use a sponge to clean off any residue and it looks brand new. I loved it to much I bought one for my brother and son.
customer_reviews.author: JMV

customer_reviews.title: Healthy way to cook, I love this grill!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic way to cook and grill my chicken, fish, grilled zucchini... So many things you can cook on this thing. It cleans so easily soak it in water for five minutes rinse it off. I actually store it inside my outdoor barbecue. When I wanna use it I walk outside, take it out of there plug it in right outside and use it. No more smelly mess in the house!
customer_reviews.author: CZun

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boats!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best electrical appliance purchase I have ever made! It’s great for boats! No open flames! It sizzles meat just as good as gas grill! Easy clean up! Even though directions says for indoor use only I think one needs to use common sense when to use out doors. We used on the back deck of our boat on a table with a beautiful sunset as our backdrop! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Prete

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is the easiest and simplest to use and very easy to come apart and put together very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shofei

customer_reviews.title: "Smokeless" but our house was filled with smoke!!😧😧
customer_reviews.text: the product design is nice. The issue is, It says "smokeless" but my house was filled with smoke and it is not really advisable to use it inside your house or else your whole house will smell the same as what you are grilling. Also after use, we cleaned it and found out that the base of the smokeless grill was partially melted and deformed (both base) due to heat. Not really safe to use. Not a value for money.
customer_reviews.author: MCO

customer_reviews.title: Clear window version IS NOT dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it could be washed in the dishwasher. However, the version with the clear viewing window cannot be. The lid must be hand washed. I’m returning it for the solid cover version so I can pop the whole dirty thing in the washer. I don’t want to mess with hand washing. Also, the window is so tiny I’m not sure it was really going to be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! Definitely easy to use and clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and use! Grilled steaks and they were perfect! Used some wood smoke seasoning to give it the "outdoor" grill flavor and that worked out just fine. Barely smoked when I first put the steaks on it but using it next to the stove allowed me to use the exhaust fan on low to keep the little bit of smoke trapped. After use, cleaned up really easy and even fit in my standard size dishwasher. Great for small kitchens, cooking for one or two people, and for people like me who don't have the time to start up those big outdoor grills for a small meal.
customer_reviews.author: NashJohnson

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because: I live where I can not have a outside grill. Being to hot to turn on the oven I found this product to be a joy to have. After opening: Putting the top and tray in place was simple. Features I like are the window on the top, the searing noted on the dial and it appears to be smokeless. I have used this cooking meats as well as vegetables and have been very happy. Clean up is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: DBL

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Indoor Electric Grill
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Hamilton Beach grill. Purchased this model so I could remove the grilling surface and wash. Easy to clean. Works great on the searing temperature for my needs. Sufficient grilling surface. Have to be careful when cleaning/wiping the inside cover, there are sharp edges on the glass panel. Cut myself (small cuts) twice already😖. Wish there was an on/off button. Don’t like pulling a “live” plug out of the electrical outlet. Otherwise satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SandraLea

customer_reviews.title: Not George but better!
customer_reviews.text: I just grilled a hamburger to perfection. I really like this grill. It’s light weight but sturdy. It’s amazingly easy to clean. I’ve been a a George person and this is my first non George purchase. I was a little surprised that, unlike George, this grill does not have top and bottom plates. However, once I got over myself, I grilled a burger and was pleasantly surprised. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: NY chic

customer_reviews.title: Cover stops splatters and allows selected foods to finis cooking just like a out door grill
customer_reviews.text: This is THE one to buy. Pay a bit more and get a lot more. Hardly smokes, but if used ner the stove fan OK. Cover stops splatters and allows selected foods to finis cooking just like a out door grill. Easy to clean as all comes apart. Slide in grease catcher works better with some water in it to assist in cleaning, helpful in giving you the "out door" flavor Over the years have had others and when moving gave them to friends, but this one beats them all. Have cooked: hamburgers, chicken, fish. and sweet potatoes , cut in half an a lower tem.
customer_reviews.author: Milo N. Illich

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! A lot of people have issues saying they’re meat ends up dry but that’s because they don’t know how to cook. Our food comes out juicy and very well cooked. It does have a sharp top where the window is and believe me I cut myself while washing it, but hello just becareful when you wash it. It cleans very easily and it’s SMOKELESS! I’ve made a bbq for 10 people easily!! I’ve cooked leg quarters, fajita, jalapeño bombers, burgers, steaks, fish and shrimp everything and anything and it comes out delicious!! 10/10 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra bravo

customer_reviews.title: No odor, good directions, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This grill is the perfect size for indoor use. I cooked pork chops and asparagus on it tonight, and both were perfect. Included were well written cooking instructions. Assembly was easy and it's easy to clean. The clear window in the top is an additional bonus for those of us that have used charcoal Webers for decades. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nainci

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it 4 or 5 times now and made great burgers and steaks each time. I really like that it is easy to clean. You can remove the lid, the grill, and the drip tray and wash them all. Cleanup each time has taken less than 20 min. The temperature only goes up to 400 so it doesn't get super hot and the cord is pretty short (2ft?), but for $60 this is a great grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Listen...I am picky..i mean extreme picky. I suffer from OCD. Forget about the negative reviews. This Grill is amazing. I cooked Filet Miñon, Ribeye, Skirt steak, pork chops and chicken and it comes out amazing. It tastes exactly...if not better than an outdoor grill. Who ever gives this a negative review is because they dont know what they are doing. PUT THE GRILL ON SEAR MODE. Trust me its the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've done salmon fillets, hot dogs, pork chops and thin sliced chicken breasts with it. All came out well. I use it outdoors as it's been in the 100s here for the past few weeks. Easy to clean (yay)! It's bigger than I thought, which could give me a storage problem. A couple of recommendations -pay attention to the cooking guide in the manual and make sure you don't use metal utensils with it.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgn

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell the difference. I love this grill.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and aren’t allowed to have an outdoor grill. This grill is amazing. I’m able to grill everything I want from inside my house. No matter how many times I use it, there is little to no smoke at all. Everything that can be grilled works on this grill. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great! Simple and easy to use and Easy to clean. Only dislike is the cord is a bit short but that’s common in kitchen appliances and an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not a "smokeless" grill
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on several smokeless grills I decided to purchase this one. Almost a perfect score. On the positive side. Very easy to assemble. That's about it. I would not call this grill smokeless because it is not. I had to use it under my stove hood. I was very disappointed. In addition, the fish i was cooking did not grill evenly. I have returned this item. Plan on doing a little more research before purchase another indoor "smokeless" grill.
customer_reviews.author: aLB

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is no longer convenient for me.
customer_reviews.text: Product base started to melt after two uses, since I wasn’t planning to return I got rid of the box. Now I’m unable to return because I was told the UPS store doesn’t have a box .... really. I live in NYC, I don’t have a car and I’ve been unable to find a box to ship the grill back. So now I have a grill I can’t use and I’ve lost out on my money. Amazon is no longer convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Great grill worth every penny to grill indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I loved grilling at home and was moving into an apartment. This has been such a blessing as I can still grill and enjoy grilled food. Very similar to an outdoor propane grill type of cook but not 100%. Grease tray and grill plate are find in the dishwasher. Smokes a little sometimes depending on the food but nothing too bad. Heats up pretty quickly. Has an open grill with slates you let the grease drip down as well as a small portion of the grill plate that does not have thru slats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: This little grill is easy to clean and a joy to use. I do use my stovetop fan but that is to be expected with an indoor grill. I sear chicken on it before finishing the cooking time in my toaster/convection oven. Everything else cooks perfectly! Love throwing veggies on it for a fast supper. Worth every penny! Update: Within weeks I had to begin using this grill on the higher setting for anything to cook. I can still use it, but forget anything between the highest setting and the off setting. Update: I chunked it
customer_reviews.author: Tallyn

customer_reviews.title: There is no warranty  back up
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after 9 months. The glass popped out and the plastic hinges broke. It like it instantaneous exploded. I would not buy it. Hamilton beach. Does not back their products up. Beware and watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this grill
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill at least 2 times each week. I love that the grates can be put in the dishwasher to be cleaned. I got this after owning a George Foreman for 5 years, I love that this grill has a lid, but not one that sits on the food and squeezes the juices out. It heats up quickly and the drip pan is large and catches everything perfectly (and can be put in dishwasher on top rack). I don't buy things that aren't dishwasher safe anymore.
customer_reviews.author: The Dunns

customer_reviews.title: Good grill, temp is a bit too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grill, I just wish the temp setting was a bit more like a gas grill burner. Instead, the temp setting is thermostat based, meaning it turns the grill on and off constantly to maintain an exact temperature. So closing the lid does not put it into 'overheat' like it does on a real grill. Other than that, i must say I am happy with this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer nerd

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous grill marks and flavor! Fantastic in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Wow the manufacturer was so nice when I told them that the first grill was probably stolen as I never received it. They immediately sent out a new one and I had the chance to use it last night. It is fantastic! Seared perfectly with gorgeous grill marks and very little smoke output. I used it on top of my stove for the vent fan just in case so the little smoke that was there went right up. The flavor was spot on and I couldn’t be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Deidree

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work !!!!
customer_reviews.text: First I was really wanting to use this as part of a good meal planning, but it just doesn’t work , temperature never got hot just warm !! How disappointing had my family waiting to make dinner and had to put chicken breast in a pan to cook .. I went with this brand because there was some good reviews but I never had this problem w a George Foreman Grill ! I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cubero

customer_reviews.title: This gizmo gives me life ! I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhhh my! This gizmo gives me life ... I love this grill. So far I used it for steaks and hot dogs. I’m very pleased with this product. Well worth every penny! It’s so easy to clean I have been cleaning it in the sink vs the dishwasher really no need to put it in the dishwasher because it cleans so easily.
customer_reviews.author: SexyLBCityChic562

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY SEARING GRILL. I can’t have gas or charcoal grill at our apartments. This has been a game changer for us. I can now BBQ outside all the meat I want (veggies too) and it’s portable. It is small, but for the price, you can’t beat it. Kind of smokeless but not totally for sure. I would buy this again and rave about it. Easy buy, don’t think twice. Cleans easy and cooks quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek W.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Electric Indoor Searing Grill with Viewing Window and Removable Easy-to-Clean Nonstick Plate, 6-Serving, Extra-Large Drip Tray, Stainless Steel (25361)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Searing Grill with WindowHamilton Beach Indoor Grill makes healthy grilling at home a breeze. Temperature setting, dishwasher safe plates & drip tray. Adjustable temperature control ranges from 200 degree to high searing temperature of 450 degree.
feature_bullets: Locks in juices and flavors: Sear at 450 degrees or use adjustable temperature dial to grill at lower heat for optimal grilling results.

Enjoy grilling all year long: This indoor grill with hood has a high searing heat that locks in juices and flavors, and lid closes to give you signature grill marks. Serves up to 6 with 118 square-inch grilling surface.
Keep an eye on your food: This indoor grill with hood comes with a convenient window in lid lets you watch food cook while keeping heat inside.
Easy to clean: Indoor grill hood, plate, and extra-large drip tray are all removable and dishwasher safe.
Less mess: Extra-large drip tray catches juices so they don't spill on your counter and it's dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
Power and preheat lights: Eliminate guesswork while using your electric grill.
Cooks more than steaks, Bbq and burgers: Grill chicken, fish, pizza, vegetables, fruit and more. also great for paleo and Keto diets.
Powerful 1200 watts and 1 year limited warranty.
Dimensions: 12.4" L x 16.7" W x 6.8" H

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,247 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
